row.field: PASSWORD_RESET_CONFIRM
Confirmation de la réinitialisation du mot de passe
This email is sent to a registered user when they indicate that they have forgotten their password or are unable to login. It provides a URL they can follow to reset their password.
PASSWORD_RESET
Réinitialisation du mot de passe
This email is sent to a registered user when they have successfully reset their password following the process described in the PASSWORD_RESET_CONFIRM email.
USER_REGISTER
Inscription d’un nouvel utilisateur
This email is sent to a newly registered user to welcome them to the system and provide them with a record of their username and password.
PUBLISH_NOTIFY
Parution du nouveau numéro
This email is sent to registered readers via the "Notify Users" link in the Editor's User Home. It notifies readers of a new issue and invites them to visit the journal at a supplied URL.
LOCKSS_EXISTING_ARCHIVE
Archiving Request for {$journalName}

Dear [University Librarian]
{$journalName} <{$journalUrl}>, is a journal for which a member of your faculty, [name of member], serves as a [title of position]. The journal is seeking to establish a LOCKSS (Lots of Copies Keep Stuff Safe) compliant archive with this and other university libraries.
[Brief description of journal]
The URL to the LOCKSS Publisher Manifest for our journal is: {$journalUrl}/gateway/lockss
We understand that you are already participating in LOCKSS. If we can provide any additional metadata for purposes of registering our journal with your version of LOCKSS, we would be happy to provide it.
Thank you, {$principalContactSignature}
This email requests the keeper of a LOCKSS archive to consider including this journal in their archive. It provides the URL to the journal's LOCKSS Publisher Manifest.
LOCKSS_NEW_ARCHIVE
Archiving Request for {$journalName}

Dear [University Librarian]
{$journalName} <{$journalUrl}>, is a journal for which a member of your faculty, [name of member] serves as a [title of position]. The journal is seeking to establish a LOCKSS (Lots of Copies Keep Stuff Safe) compliant archive with this and other university libraries.
[Brief description of journal]
The LOCKSS Program <http://lockss.stanford.edu/>, an international library/publisher initiative, is a working example of a distributed preservation and archiving repository, additional details are below. The software, which runs on an ordinary personal computer is free; the system is easily brought on-line; very little ongoing maintenance is required.
To assist in the archiving of our journal, we invite you to become a member of the LOCKSS community, to help collect and preserve titles produced by your faculty and by other scholars worldwide. To do so, please have someone on your staff visit the LOCKSS site for information on how this system operates. I look forward to hearing from you on the feasibility of providing this archiving support for this journal.
Thank you, {$principalContactSignature}
This email encourages the recipient to participate in the LOCKSS initiative and include this journal in the archive. It provides information about the LOCKSS initiative and ways to become involved.
SUBMISSION_ACK
Accusé réception pour la soumission

This email, when enabled, is automatically sent to an author when he or she completes the process of submitting a manuscript to the journal. It provides information about tracking the submission through the process and thanks the author for the submission.
SUBMISSION_UNSUITABLE
Unsuitable Submission
SUBMISSION_COMMENT
Submission Comment
This email notifies the various people involved in a submission's editing process that a new comment has been posted.
SUBMISSION_DECISION_REVIEWERS
Décision concernant le manuscrit intitulé « {$articleTitle} »

This email notifies the reviewers of a submission that the review process has been completed. It includes information about the article and the decision reached, and thanks the reviewers for their contributions.
EDITOR_ASSIGN
Attribution d’un manuscrit

This email notifies a Section Editor that the Editor has assigned them the task of overseeing a submission through the editing process. It provides information about the submission and how to access the journal site.
REVIEW_REQUEST
Demande pour l’évaluation d’un article

This email from the Section Editor to a Reviewer requests that the reviewer accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It provides information about the submission such as the title and abstract, a review due date, and how to access the submission itself. This message is used when the Standard Review Process is selected in Journal Setup, Step 2. (Otherwise see REVIEW_REQUEST_ATTACHED.)
REVIEW_REQUEST_ONECLICK
Article Review Request

This email from the Section Editor to a Reviewer requests that the reviewer accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It provides information about the submission such as the title and abstract, a review due date, and how to access the submission itself. This message is used when the Standard Review Process is selected in Journal Setup, Step 2, and one-click reviewer access is enabled.
REVIEW_REQUEST_ATTACHED
Demande pour l’évaluation d’un article

{$reviewerName},
Je crois que vous seriez un excellent pair examinateur pour le manuscrit intitulé « {$articleTitle} ». J’espère que vous accepterez ce travail important pour la revue. Les lignes directrices en matière d’évaluation se trouvent ci-dessous, et la soumission est jointe au présent courriel.
Veuillez me faire savoir par courriel d’ici le {$weekLaterDate} si vous acceptez ou non d’effectuer cette évaluation.
J’espère que vous accepterez ma demande.
Lignes directrices pour l’évaluation {$reviewGuidelines}

This email is sent by the Section Editor to a Reviewer to request that they accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It includes the submission as an attachment. This message is used when the Email-Attachment Review Process is selected in Journal Setup, Step 2. (Otherwise see REVIEW_REQUEST.)
REVIEW_CANCEL
Annulation de la demande d’évaluation

{$reviewerName},
Nous avons décidé d’annuler notre demande concernant l’évaluation du manuscrit intitulé « {$articleTitle} » pour {$journalName}. Nous sommes désolés de tout inconvénient que cela pourrait vous causer et nous espérons que nous pourrons compter sur votre collaboration pour un autre projet.
Si vous avez des questions, n’hésitez pas à communiquer avec nous.
{$editorialContactSignature}
This email is sent by the Section Editor to a Reviewer who has a submission review in progress to notify them that the review has been cancelled.
REVIEW_CONFIRM
En mesure d’évaluer le manuscrit

This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Section Editor in response to a review request to notify the Section Editor that the review request has been accepted and will be completed by the specified date.
REVIEW_DECLINE
Dans l’impossibilité d’évaluer le manuscrit
This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Section Editor in response to a review request to notify the Section Editor that the review request has been declined.
REVIEW_COMPLETE
Évaluation de l’article terminée
This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Section Editor to notify them that a review has been completed and the comments and recommendations have been recorded on the journal web site.
REVIEW_ACK
Accusé réception pour l’évaluation de l’article
This email is sent by a Section Editor to confirm receipt of a completed review and thank the reviewer for their contributions.
REVIEW_REMIND
Rappel concernant l’évaluation d’une soumission
This email is sent by a Section Editor to remind a reviewer that their review is due.
REVIEW_REMIND_ONECLICK
Submission Review Reminder
This email is sent by a Section Editor to remind a reviewer that their review is due.
REVIEW_REMIND_AUTO
Rappel automatique pour l’évaluation d’une soumission

This email is automatically sent when a reviewer's due date elapses (see Review Options under Journal Setup, Step 2) and one-click reviewer access is disabled. Scheduled tasks must be enabled and configured (see the site configuration file).
REVIEW_REMIND_AUTO_ONECLICK
Automated Submission Review Reminder

This email is automatically sent when a reviewer's due date elapses (see Review Options under Journal Setup, Step 2) and one-click reviewer access is enabled. Scheduled tasks must be enabled and configured (see the site configuration file).
EDITOR_REVIEW
Évaluation de l’article par le rédacteur en chef
This email is sent by a Section Editor to a submission's Author to notify them that a decision has been reached in regard to a submission.
COPYEDIT_REQUEST
Demande concernant la révision d’un article
This email is sent by a Section Editor to a submission's Copyeditor to request that they begin the copyediting process. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.
COPYEDIT_COMPLETE
Révision terminée
COPYEDIT_ACK
Accusé réception pour la révision
This email is sent by the Section Editor to a submission's Copyeditor to acknowledge that the Copyeditor has successfully completed the copyediting process and thank them for their contribution.
COPYEDIT_AUTHOR_REQUEST
Demande pour la révision finale

This email is sent by the Section Editor to a submission's Author to request that they proofread the work of the copyeditor. It provides access information for the manuscript and warns that this is the last opportunity the author has to make substantial changes.
COPYEDIT_AUTHOR_COMPLETE
Révision finale terminée
This email is sent by the Author to the Section Editor to notify them that the Author's copyediting process has been completed.
COPYEDIT_AUTHOR_ACK
Accusé réception pour la révision finale
This email is sent by the Section Editor to a submission's Author to confirm completion of the Author's copyediting process and thank them for their contribution.
COPYEDIT_FINAL_REQUEST
Révision de la version définitive terminée
This email from the Section Editor to the Copyeditor requests that they perform a final round of copyediting on a submission before it enters the layout process.
COPYEDIT_FINAL_COMPLETE
Révision de la version définitive terminée
This email from the Copyeditor to the Section Editor notifies them that the final round of copyediting has been completed and that the layout process may now begin.
COPYEDIT_FINAL_ACK
Accusé réception pour la révision de la version définitive
This email from the Section Editor to the Copyeditor acknowledges completion of the final round of copyediting and thanks them for their contribution.
LAYOUT_REQUEST
Demande pour la mise en page

This email from the Section Editor to the Layout Editor notifies them that they have been assigned the task of performing layout editing on a submission. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.
LAYOUT_COMPLETE
Mise en page terminée

{$editorialContactName},
Les épreuves du manuscrit intitulé « {$articleTitle} » pour {$journalName} sont maintenant prêtes pour leur correction.
Si vous avez des questions, n’hésitez pas à communiquer avec moi.
{$layoutEditorName}
This email from the Layout Editor to the Section Editor notifies them that the layout process has been completed.
LAYOUT_ACK
Accusé réception pour la mise en page
This email from the Section Editor to the Layout Editor acknowledges completion of the layout editing process and thanks the layout editor for their contribution.
PROOFREAD_AUTHOR_REQUEST
Demande pour une correction d’épreuves (auteur)
This email from the Section Editor to the Author notifies them that an article's galleys are ready for proofreading. It provides information about the article and how to access it.
PROOFREAD_AUTHOR_COMPLETE
Correction d’épreuves terminée (auteur)
This email from the Author to the Proofreader and Editor notifies them that the Author's round of proofreading is complete and that details can be found in the article comments.
PROOFREAD_AUTHOR_ACK
Accusé réception pour la correction d’épreuves (auteur)

{$authorName},
Nous vous remercions d’avoir accepté de corriger les épreuves de votre manuscrit intitulé « {$articleTitle} » pour {$journalName}. Nous sommes heureux de publier vos travaux dans notre revue.
Si vous êtes inscrit à notre service de notification, vous recevrez par courriel la table des matières de la revue dès que votre article sera publié. Si vous avez des questions, n’hésitez pas à communiquer avec nous.
{$editorialContactSignature}
This email from the Section Editor to the Author acknowledges completion of the initial proofreading process and thanks them for their contribution.
PROOFREAD_REQUEST
Demande pour la correction d’épreuves
This email from the Section Editor to the Proofreader requests that they perform proofreading of an article's galleys. It provides information about the article and how to access it.
PROOFREAD_COMPLETE
Correction d’épreuves terminée
This email from the Proofreader to the Section Editor notifies them that the Proofreader has completed the proofreading process.
PROOFREAD_ACK
Accusé réception pour la correction d’épreuves
This email from the Section Editor to the Proofreader confirms completion of the proofreader's proofreading process and thanks them for their contribution.
PROOFREAD_LAYOUT_REQUEST
Demande pour une correction d’épreuves (responsable de la mise en page)
This email from the Section Editor to the Layout Editor notifies them that an article's galleys are ready for final proofreading. It provides information on the article and how to access it.
PROOFREAD_LAYOUT_COMPLETE
Correction d’épreuves terminée (responsable de la mise en page)
This email from the Layout Editor to the Section Editor notifies them that the final stage of proofreading has been completed and the article is now ready to publish.
PROOFREAD_LAYOUT_ACK
Accusé réception pour la correction d’épreuves (responsable de la mise en page)
This email from the Section Editor to the Layout Editor acknowledges completion of the final stage of proofreading and thanks them for their contribution.
EMAIL_LINK
Article potentiellement intéressant

Je pense que l’article suivant pourrait vous intéresser : « {$articleTitle} » par {$authorName}, publié dans le volume {$volume}, numéro {$number} de ({$year}) de la revue {$journalName}. Vous le trouverez à l’adresse suivante : {$articleUrl}.

This email template provides a registered reader with the opportunity to send information about an article to somebody who may be interested. It is available via the Reading Tools and must be enabled by the Journal Manager in the Reading Tools Administration page.
SUBSCRIPTION_NOTIFY
Avis d’abonnement

{$subscriberName},
Vous êtes maintenant abonné à notre système de gestion en ligne pour {$journalName}, avec le type d’abonnement suivant :
{$subscriptionType}
Pour accéder au contenu destiné seulement aux abonnés, entrez dans le système à l’aide de votre nom d’utilisateur : {$username}.
Une fois dans le système, vous pouvez changer votre profil et votre mot de passe en tout temps.
Veuillez prendre note que si vous avez un abonnement institutionnel, les utilisateurs n’ont pas à entrer de nom d’utilisateur puisque le système authentifiera automatiquement les demandes.
Si vous avez des questions, n’hésitez pas à communiquer avec moi.
{$subscriptionContactSignature}
This email notifies a registered reader that the Manager has created a subscription for them. It provides the journal's URL along with instructions for access.
SUBSCRIPTION_BEFORE_EXPIRY_REMIND
Notice of Subscription Expiry
This email notifies a subscriber that their subscription will soon expire. It provides the journal's URL along with instructions for access.
SUBSCRIPTION_AFTER_EXPIRY_REMIND
Subscription Expired
This email notifies a subscriber that their subscription has expired. It provides the journal's URL along with instructions for access.
SUBSCRIPTION_AFTER_EXPIRY_REMIND_FINAL
Subscription Expired - Final Reminder
This email notifies a subscriber that their subscription has expired. It provides the journal's URL along with instructions for access.
